User can book online consultations and even consult online."},{"title":"MOVIE TICKET BOOKING SYSTEM","start_date":"Feb 2020","end_date":"Apr 2020","description":"Created a website that facilitates movie ticket booking using Django framework, SQLite Database and HTML, CSS interface.
